original_text: A big crowd of people come to his funeral. They make a heap of earth over his body, in the valley where he rests happily. A big crowd of people come to his funeral. They make a heap of earth over his body, in the valley where he rests happily. A big crowd of people come to his funeral. They make a heap of earth over his body, in the valley where he rests happily. A big crowd of people come to his funeral.
korean_text: 그는 골짜기의 흙덩이를 달게 여기리니 많은 사람들이 그보다 앞서 갔으며 모든 사람이 그의 뒤에 줄지었느니라

sentences.original_text: A big crowd of people come to his funeral.
They make a heap of earth over his body,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 몸 위에 흙더미를 만들고,

sentences.original_text: in the valley where he rests happily.
